Title: On .NET Live | Distributed applications made with Microsoft Orleans and Event Sourcing using Sekiban
Author: dotnet
Description:
Let's learn about distributed application made with Microsoft Orleans and Event Sourcing. This week, we'll talk to Tomohisa Takaoka. He and other contributors built an event sourcing and CQRS Framework with C# called Sekiban. It is open source, improves developer productivity, and easily integrates with LLM agents with VS Code.
